Name: Statuette of a Maidservant Brewing Beer
Description: This painted wooden model shows a woman wearing a short wig and a short white skirt standing in front of a beer jar. The model shows the beer-making process. The rounded slab placed over the mouth of the vat was used to strain the mash. The filtered beer ran out of a hole near the bottom of the vat. The beer was then stored in another jar, that is here placed on the opposite side of the base.
